price: It is He Who spread out the earth for you, and made therein pathways for you, so that you may find your way.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَهۡدٗا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا سُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-arḍa mahdan wajaʿala lakum fīhā subulan laʿallakum tahtadūna
